name: leave-notes-1
description: Web App for centralized place for text notes for multiple users.

scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix server install
scripts.build: npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server run build
scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm --prefix client run dev' 'npm --prefix server run dev'
scripts.serve: concurrently 'npm --prefix client run preview' 'npm --prefix server run serve'
